definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

pinyin: zai4 ren2 gui3 dao4 kong1 jian1 zhan4

sentences.english: Musk’s rockets are ultimately intended to carry cargo and crew to the space station.
sentences.chinese: 马斯科的火箭最终计划为空间站输送货物和宇航员。

sentences.english: The first commercially contracted re-supply mission to the International Space Station (ISS) has begun.
sentences.chinese: 对国际空间站的首个商业化补给任务已经开始实行。

sentences.english: Two astronauts spent six and a half hours unhooking a girder from the International Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 两名宇航员花了六个半小时解开国际空间站上地钢架。

sentences.english: The first two modules of the International Space Station were assembled in December 1998. In the foreground is the Unity module, which was built by the United States.
sentences.chinese: 空间站最早的两个舱是在1998年组装的。

sentences.english: The International Space Station is a bit roomier.
sentences.chinese: 国际空间站更宽敞了一些。

sentences.english: Watch video of Mir's debris trail taken from a South Pacific island.
sentences.chinese: 观看从南太平洋岛采取的和平号空间站碎片的视频。

sentences.english: The International Space Station is a big roomier .
sentences.chinese: 国际空间站的空间将变得更大。

sentences.english: A space station cannot be launched in one shot.
sentences.chinese: 武平说，“空间站不可能一次发射入轨。

sentences.english: The problems involved in long-term station operation were solved.
sentences.chinese: 伴随着长期空间站任务的许多难题迎刃而解。

sentences.english: Withinthe next decade, China expects to open a permanent space station in the Earth'sorbit.
sentences.chinese: 在下个十年，中国计划建立一个地球轨道永久空间站。

sentences.english: AZUZ: Well, there it is. That is what Hurricane Earl looks like from the international space station.
sentences.chinese: 这就是从国际空间站看到的飓风厄尔的形状。

sentences.english: The space shuttle Discovery has arrived at the International Space Station for a nine-day stay.
sentences.chinese: 发现号航天飞机已经到达国际空间站并做九天的停留。

sentences.english: It will house many of the station’s life-support systems.
sentences.chinese: 它可容纳空间站的许多生命支持系统。

sentences.english: The view is to the north of the station’s ground track.
sentences.chinese: 拍摄视角是空间站地面轨迹正北方。

sentences.english: Discovery is set to undock from the station on Monday.
sentences.chinese: “发现号”在周一将从空间站脱离。

sentences.english: In this paper, the quaternion is taken for positional parameters to control attitude of the space station.
sentences.chinese: 以四元数作为定位参数对空间站进行姿态控制。
